resources.string:
How to Play: 
 
 Help Charlie go up the river, towards the Pockylate Factory, by tapping on the Pocky box in the bottom row. As you select Charlie's path, Charlie will move up the river so you can always select Charlie's next jump by selecting a tile in the bottom row. Be careful not to tap the water! Charlie cannot swim. 
 
 Pocky Stats is a tool that can convert common units into terms of Pocky sticks and boxes. 
 
 
 Image credits: 水玉子 from pixiv.net, 繁小兔喵 from it.me, ©2011-2014 Fox-feathers from DeviantArt, ©2009-2014 A-Little-Kitty DeviantArt, ©2009-2014 milkbun from DeviantArt, ©2012-2014 ppshex from DeviantArt, VectorStock Font: Good Dog by Fonthead Design Music: Dance2 by ORANGE RANGE
